LaGriT Open Source

LaGriT V3 LA-CC-15-069 is distributed as open-source software under a BSD 3-Clause License (See below). The Github repository includes source code, compile instructions, and tests for both LaGriT and PyLaGriT. External collaborators are welcome to particpate, see the contributor agreement in the repo. It also includes a snapshot of this site, lagrit.lanl.gov.

git clone https://github.com/lanl/LaGriT

The following external Exodus II libraries are used with the LaGriT build. For Questions regarding these libraries, contact Greg Sjaardema at Sandia National Laboratories (gdsjaar@sandia.gov).

  • ExodusII 6
  • HDF5
  • NetCDF4.3
  • zlib-1.2.8
